scripts.deploy: ng build --configuration production && cd dist && mkdir profile projects publications others galleries && echo profile projects publications others galleries | xargs -n 1 cp -v index.html && cd ../src/app/ && find others -type d | xargs -I dir mkdir -p ../../dist/dir && cd ../../dist/others && find . -type d | xargs -n 1 cp -v -n index.html && cd ../../src/app/ && find projects -type d | xargs -I dir mkdir -p ../../dist/dir && cd ../../dist/projects && find . -type d | xargs -n 1 cp -v -n index.html && cd ../../src/app/ && find galleries -type d | xargs -I dir mkdir -p ../../dist/dir && cd ../../dist/galleries && find . -type d | xargs -n 1 cp -v -n index.html && cd ../../ && ngh --branch=master --cname=yushisato.com --repo https://github.com/youseegreen/youseegreen.github.io.git
